page.title: 04OTTERTON PRIMARY SCHOOL (II)
page.content:
We have 3 playtimes, one from 10:30 to 10:45 the second playtime is when we have finished our lunch until 1.15p.m. the last one at 2:30 to 2:40.
This school year the school achieved the following in competitions:- 1){Primary Schools Chess League _ Runners up 2){Inter School Sports}_ Runners up 3){Otter Valley Association}quiz _ Winner (Richard W.) 4){Inter school football}_ 50% Score 5){Exmouth Junior Chess Congress}_ 2nd was Matthew Harris. 6){Devon Primary Schools Chess}_ 5th A good year for being Runners-Up! The school sometimes organises outings to the{Northcott Theatre}to see plays. In the Summer Term we sometimes get invited to swim once a week in Ladram Bay Camp Pool.
